name: falcon

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Falcon: a set of tools for fast aligning long reads for consensus and
assembly. The Falcon tool kit is a set of simple code collection which I
use for studying efficient assembly algorithm for haploid and diploid
genomes. It has some back-end code implemented in C for speed and some
simple front-end written in Python for convenience.

dependencies.name: pacbio-daligner
dependencies.description:
Daligner: The Dazzler "Overlap" Module. This is a special fork required
for some pacbio utilities.

dependencies.name: pacbio-damasker
dependencies.description:
Damasker: The Dazzler Repeat Masking Suite. This is a special fork
required for some pacbio utilities.

dependencies.name: pacbio-dazz-db
dependencies.description:
The Dazzler Database Library. This version is a special fork required
for some pacbio utilities.

dependencies.name: pacbio-dextractor
dependencies.description:
The Dextractor and Compression Command Library. This is a special fork
required by some pacbio utilities.

dependencies.name: py-networkx
dependencies.description:
NetworkX is a Python package for the creation, manipulation, and study
of the structure, dynamics, and functions of complex networks.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-pypeflow
dependencies.description:
pypeFLOW is light weight and reusable make / flow data process library
written in Python.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: python-venv
dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
